segments.text: I notice the boy stretching to reach the cookie jar, standing precariously on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is waiting eagerly, hoping to get a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They seem to be working together, which is quite clever of them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the stool might tip over any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely unaware, just polishing that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the water streaming down the cabinet doors, creating a slippery floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how focused she is on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful and well-kept.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get away with taking those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene feels like a moment frozen in time, just before everything goes wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR
